snippet: Kate and Ben Towill moved from Brooklyn Heights to a 1919 two-story house that they extensively renovated in Charleston’s Hampton Park Terrace neighborhood.
abstract: Kate and Ben Towill, craving more space, left their 500-square-foot Brooklyn studio for two-story 1919 house in Hampton Park Terrace neighborhood of Charleston, SC; after extensive renovations, couple started design company to restore old homes.
lead_paragraph: Kate and Ben Towill moved from Brooklyn Heights to a 1919 two-story house that they extensively renovated in Charleston’s Hampton Park Terrace neighborhood.

headline.main: Leaving Brooklyn for a Charleston Cottage
